title: Appreciating Every Area Of Our Life
itunes:title: Appreciating Every Area Of Our Life
description:
When we appreciate something, we bring value to it and we are less likely to take it for granted. In Deuteronomy 10 - 12, God said to the Children of Israel, "Don't take these gifts I’ve given you for granted, and don't forget who gave them to you." Appreciation honors God.Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love. To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
